author: Gee Bee
comment: i need degrees Celsius and 24 hour clock and   then i would buy.

reply.author: Tamago Design
reply.content:
Temperature unit can toggle between Fahrenheit (F) and Celsius (C), please check the postal for more detail. (Tap on the weather icon to bring up forecast display mode, and you can select temperature unit there).
Thanks for your feedback regarding 24 hour system, will let you know once this is implemented.

title: Very nice but...
